title: [BUG]
body: When i try to reconnect it wont let me and keep popping up bug splat. Also i wasnt dc but i was so my team cant remake gg riot{{item:3070}}

replies.body: Bug splat errors suggest an issue with your computer loading the game.   It could be a corrupt game file, outdated graphics driver, or something else.  We have a [Game Crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq5) guide to troubleshoot this with steps for each case, and help get you back in the game.
